explanation: [0-0] The upper part of the screen shows gameplay, with a brown car driving on a flat desert road. Several objects are floating in the sky ahead of the car. The lower part of the screen shows two hands gripping a steering wheel controller. To the right is a gear shift controller, and in front is a display screen.

[0-2] The car moves forward quickly, revealing the objects in the sky to be large concrete pipes. There is a slope ahead of the car, marked with a yellow forward symbol. The player steers the car towards the slope, making the car flip in the air.

[0-2] The car moves forward quickly, revealing the objects in the sky to be large concrete pipes. There is a slope ahead of the car, marked with a yellow forward symbol. The player steers the car towards the slope, making the car flip in the air.

[2-10] The car flips through the air, passing through each concrete pipe, which is the same size as the car. Every time the car passes through a pipe, the screen flashes white. The hand below places itself on the gear lever after the car passes through five concrete pipes, while the left hand turns the steering wheel to the right. The flat road and distant ocean can be seen on the ground. Finally, a flat platform appears in front of the car.

[10-12] The car lands smoothly on the platform and continues driving forward. A wall appears ahead with a car-sized opening at the bottom. The car passes through without incident, with both hands now on the steering wheel. Beyond the wall, another concrete pipe is visible, with several excavators with their arms resting on platforms visible in the distance. Both hands keep the steering wheel steady, driving the car straight ahead. As the car exits the pipe, the steering wheel is turned quickly, causing the car to spin in the air, aligning its rear with its front. The other hand is placed on the gear lever.

The car passes through without incident, with both hands now on the steering wheel. Both hands keep the steering wheel steady, driving the car straight ahead. As the car exits the pipe, the steering wheel is turned quickly, causing the car to spin in the air, aligning its rear with its front. The other hand is placed on the gear lever.

[12-17] The car spins through the air, passing through the four excavators ahead. While passing through the excavators, the hand on the gear lever returns to the steering wheel. The car now faces forward, and behind it is an open garage with space for two cars. The hands release the steering wheel, allowing it to spin freely, and the car begins to turn. Finally, both hands grip the steering wheel, steering the car backwards into the garage and parking it in the space.
